body_content.explanation: stories, characters, actions, etc. that are included in a film, television show, computer game, comic book, performance, etc. in order to please its fans :
examples: What I like about this show is there's very little fan service, like the cliché of your two favourite bad-but-good guys teaming up to take down an enemy.
I recommend it highly if you want a game stuffed full of fan-service.
It's disappointing that the female characters are used mostly for fanservice.
